alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Palo Duro Canyon (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 21 at 2:27PM CDT until March 22 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Armstrong and Palo Duro Canyon Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Call 800-452-9292 for road information.
